Hi,

> But still I am getting same problem.
>
>   This show error at command prompt ...
> (...)

Did you also copy the "profiles" directory from the heritrix-1.10.1.jar to
HERITRIX_HOME\conf ?
See: http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/2085
(you can also extract the profiles from the heritrix...jar instead of
downloading the src package)

HTH,
Max
